name: Squid helpline
description:
This Is My first game uploaded in itch.io
 In this game you have to complete 4 mission

In first mission-
Jump and cross the lava and you have to touch the door

In second mission-
You have to save from snake for few seconds

In third mission-
You have to save the house from elephant by using wall shape

In forth and last mission-
You have to save the elephant from lava by using plain shapeIn game-you should discover your selfIn shop-you need money which you will get from mission
